nodes.text: Myrkr was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Inner Rim. Myrkr sat at grid square N-7 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Myrkr was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. Myrkr first appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in Heir to the Empire, a 1991 novel authored by Timothy Zahn as the first installment of Star Wars: The Thrawn Trilogy.
